Affix.Name: Vourukasha's Glow
Affix.Desc: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG will be increased by 10%. After the equipping character takes DMG, the aforementioned DMG Bonus is increased by 80% for 5s. This effect increase can have 5 stacks. The duration of each stack is counted independently. These effects can be triggered even when the equipping character is not on the field.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Feast of Boundless Joy
EQUIP_RING.Desc: An opulent wine goblet that was once filled with nectar and honeydew, but is empty today.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Vibrant Pinion
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: An exquisite feather-shaped decoration on which the vivid hues of verdant leaves and fragrant flowers shimmer.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Heart of Khvarena's Brilliance
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: Intricate and vibrant earrings upon which the luster of a hundred flowers seems to flow.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Stamen of Khvarena's Origin
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: An insignia in the shape of a lovely little flower that was once worn by pilgrims in times long bygone.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Ancient Abscission
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: An ancient timepiece upon which the light of Khvarena gleams. It is filled with a pure liquid that appears alive.
